statusLine.command: input=$(cat); raw_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir=$(echo "$raw_dir" | sed "s|$HOME|~|"); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); ctx_info=$(printf '%d%%' "$pct"); else ctx_info='0%'; fi; branch=$(cd "$raw_dir" 2>/dev/null && git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo ''); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git_info=$(printf ' \033[35m%s\033[0m |' "$branch"); else git_info=' |'; fi; printf '\033[36m%s\033[0m |%s \033[33m%s\033[0m | \033[32m%s\033[0m' "$dir" "$git_info" "$model" "$ctx_info"
